Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (8H37 Qa67 3 Trtari 4a4) Fax 91-11225093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) m-5 W4 6, 747-10, a1a #07-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka New Delhi-110075 No.11041/217/2007-Admn. 29.07.2016 PQLCY MAIERS ADMINISTRAIION FINANCE (178/2016) (Decision taken in NHAI/I1O13/LA/Misc /CALAs/FTS-8 /2016} Sub: Provision of additional CALAs In cases where CALAs are highly loaded reg: 1 has been observed that the amount of land to be acquired and the compensation to be disbursed vary across CALAs It should be possible to complete the process of land acquisition from 3A (preliminary intention to acquire Notification) to 3G (declaration of award by CALA) within a duration 02 years, the work-load of some CALAs is too high to enable achievement of these timelines. 2 For the reason mentioned in Para-| above, there iS a need to set & threshold value of total land to be acquired, above which the CALAs would need additional support to meet the land acquisition targets within the aforesaid timeline of 02 years. CALAs with workload of acquiring private land of more than 40 Ha. shall be deemed as 'highly loaded' CALAs. For these CALAs, the RO shall raise request to the State Government for appointment of an additional CALA in the same district, so that the Ioad may be equally distributed and the CALAs in the District can ensure land acquisition within the said timeline of 02 years. This issues with the approval of Competent Authority . (A.K  Sadhu) CGM (Coord:) To: AIl Officers & Ernployees of HQIROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices
